attributes.description:
Become part of my artworks, get included as a cameo or side character in my personal art that includes multiple characters which would otherwise be made-up ones, which is usually quite frequent in my artworks. You can let me know your preferences if there's any theme or scenario you'd enjoy more or that you'd rather not be included into of course. On top of that each month a couple patrons in this tier will get rewarded a sketch request! You'll also get all the benefits from the previous tiers!

"You're one of the largest supporters around, and in some cases, size matters!"
attributes.title: Macro Patron
